wikipedia_page.main: Vernon Sampson Nicholls (3 September 1917– 2 February 1996) was an Anglican clergyman who served in the Church of England as the Bishop of Sodor and Man from 1974 to 1983.

* Vernon Nicholls (1917–1996), English clergyman, Bishop of Sodor and Man. Multiple English lodges, and Provincial Grand Master (UGLE) for Warwickshire.
